on_boarding_screen1_title: Want to maintain, lose or gain weight? 🤔
on_boarding_screen1_body: Our app help you to do it by healthy way. App calculates calories daily and how many calories you should eat.
on_boarding_screen2_title: Want to fix the way you drink water? 💧
on_boarding_screen2_body: Our app help you to track your daily water intake to reach the healthy goal.
on_boarding_screen3_title: Your partner in health and nutrition 💪
on_boarding_screen3_body: Daily you enter the 3 main meals and our app calculates calories, protein, fats and carbs you have eat from the goal of nutrition plan.
on_boarding_screen4_title: Want to buy healthy food and products? 🛒
on_boarding_screen4_body: You can make order to buy many healthy products and food.
on_boarding_screen5_title: Make your healthy meal by yourself 🍽
on_boarding_screen5_body: There are many healthy recipes for you that help you to make delicious and healthy food in the same.
on_boarding_screen6_title: Know how many your food contains calories 🍛
on_boarding_screen6_body: You can take photo of your food and app detects the image, then gives you how many calories, fats, carbs, protein in your food.
ex_not_active: Spend most of the day sitting (e.g., desk jop)
ex_lightly_active: Spend a good part of the day on your feet and train from 1 to 3 days (e.g., teacher, salesperson).
ex_active: Spend a good part of the day doing some physical activity and train from 3 to 5 days (e.g., food server, postal carrier).
ex_very_active: Spend a good part of the day doing heavy physical activity train from 5 to 7 days (e.g., bike messenger, carpenter).
ex_hulk: Spend most of the day Hard training
goal-weight-greater-current-weight: the goal weight greater than current weight so you can only gain weight
goal-weight-smaller-current-weight: the goal weight smaller than current weight so you can only loss weight
goal-weight-equal-current-weight: the goal weight equal than current weight so you can only maintain weight
reached-water-track-goal: Great job! You\'re reached your goal.
remember-drink-more-water: Remember to drink more if you\'re thirsty or if you exercise.
